ags:resource.dc:title: List of Species as recorded by Canadian and EU Bottom Trawl Surveys in Flemish Cap
ags:resource.dc:description: A list of species has been prepared with all records in each haul of both Canadian (1977-1985) and EU (1988-2002 and 2003-2012) bottom trawl surveys. Even though sampling intensity and taxonomic interest changed with time, the three periods can be considered almost homogeneous. Main change occurred when the EU survey increased the depth range, from 730 to 1460 meters depth, and all invertebrates were recorded.
ags:resource.dc:identifier: Vázquez, A., J.M. Casas, W.B. Brodie, F.J. Murillo, M. Mandado, A. Gago, R. Alpoim, R. Bañón, A. Armesto. 2013. List of Species as recorded by Canadian and EU Bottom Trawl Surveys in Flemish Cap. NAFO Sci. Coun. Res. Doc. 13/005, Serial Nº N6154: 13p.
